channel.title: Recent Reviews Near Alexandria, VA
channel.description: Yelp - Recent Reviews Near Alexandria, VA

item.title: Patricia S.'s Review of Farmers & Fishers - Washington, DC (3/5) on Yelp
item.description:
It's really 2.5 stars, but I'm giving it the benefit of the doubt.
We went here because of a recommendation from a friend, not knowing what to expect. First of all - I think the area is a bit tacky…

item.title: Marissa O.'s Review of Columbia Pike Farmers Market - Arlington (3/5) on Yelp
item.description: 3.5. It's not a huge market and is completely anemic in the winter. (I actually went to check it out after one of the major snowstorms this year, and there were 4 poor vendors, braving the cold.…

item.title: Grant H.'s Review of Chili's Grill & Bar - Vienna (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: The food here is always great, and the margaritas are tasty. It is occasionally understaffed in the lounge area. When that happens, the service can be a little slow, which is especially frustrating…

item.title: Hannah C.'s Review of National Gallery of Art - Washington, DC (5/5) on Yelp
item.description:
Best way to go to the museum: Alone.
Why: Because nothing that I like is what you will like and vice versa. Also, this place is so big, I don't want to have to walk around looking at my favorite…

item.title: Brian C.'s Review of Cairo Wine & Liquor - Washington, DC (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: AMAZING selection of beer and wine at this place, and the prices are par for the neighborhood. I haven't found a better beer selection anywhere in the city.
